content: looking for a cake to celebrate a special occasion i gotcha covered this sweet six layered cake is a show stopper and is sure to bring a smile to anyone s face who sees it layers of frosting and colorful cake plus those added dollops on top this amigurumi cake is definitely the sweetest thing around customize your cake by making it in different flavors like funfetti or chocolate or even add a few more of those dollops of frosting because we all know those are the best parts crochet pattern includes step by step photos to help you along as you create your own tiered cake crochet pattern difficulty beginner/intermediate pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size f/3 75mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes black embroidery floss and embroidery needle polyester fiberfill stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins thick cardboard skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease crocheting in back loops only crocheting in front loops only chain slip_stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet how to change colors finished sizes- cake measures 4 5 inches tall by 5 inches wide please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use
